name: Beyond the Flesh
description:
Submission for Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1 with theme IT IS NOT REAL.

Paths are not real. Lava is hot. Will you ever reach the light?

How to Play

Watch carefully as each level shows you the real path just once and then replaces it with a fake path. But worry not, if you die the path will be shown to you again. Try to make it across the lava field to the star at the end of the level by following the correct path.

Controls

WASD or arrow keys for movement

The true third path

Even the game lies to you about the path in the third level. The REAL path below

Credits

  • Programming, level design: https://www.instagram.com/iamdylanhenderson/
  • Programming, character design and movement: https://www.instagram.com/sepeth/
